plasma: Boemo ba taba bo nang le likaroloana tse qosoang (ion le lielektrone)
ionic: Tlamahano e entsoeng ka ho hohela pakeng tsa li-ion tse qosoang ka tsela e fapaneng
covalent: Bond e entsoeng ka ho arolelana lielektrone pakeng tsa liathomo
metallic: Tlamahano e entsoeng ka ho hohela pakeng tsa li-cations tse ntle tsa tšepe le li-electrone tse fokolang
balancing equation: Equation ea lik'hemik'hale e nang le lipalo tse lekanang tsa liathomo tsa element ka 'ngoe mahlakoreng ka bobeli
mole: Yuniti e sebedisetswang ho metha bongata ba ntho (palo ya dikarolwana tsa Avogadro)
palo ea bongata: Kakaretso ea liprothone le li-neutron khubung ea athomo
nomoro ea athomo: Palo ea liprothone khubung ea athomo (e khetha boitsebiso ba element)
isotope: Liathomo tsa element e le 'ngoe e nang le lipalo tse fapaneng tsa li-neutron
oxidation: Ho lahleheloa ke lielektrone ho athomo kapa molek'hule
phokotso: Ho fumana lielektrone ka athomo kapa molek'hule
redox: Karabelo ea lik'hemik'hale e kenyelletsang ts'ebetso ea oxidation le phokotso
matla a ho kenya tshebetsong: Matla a fokolang a hlokahalang bakeng sa karabelo ea lik'hemik'hale
catalyst: Ntho e eketsang sekhahla sa tšebetso ea lik'hemik'hale ntle le ho jeoa
thermodynamics: Lekala la k'hemistri le amanang le mocheso, mosebetsi, mocheso le matla
endothermic: Karabelo ea lik'hemik'hale e monyang mocheso ho tsoa tikolohong
exothermic: Metsoako ea lik'hemik'hale e ntšang mocheso tikolohong
